description: In June 2024, a mysterious 30-nanosecond radio burst baffled scientists — until they traced it back to a surprising source: Relay 2, a NASA satellite offline since 1967. Researchers believe the signal could have been triggered either by a micrometeorite impact or an electrostatic discharge. The discovery, detailed in a new preprint study, highlights how defunct satellites may still interact with space conditions. Experts say the incident could offer a new method for detecting electrostatic discharges from aging satellites and space debris in crowded orbits.
title: Dead NASA Satellite Relay 2 May Have Caused Mysterious 2024 Radio Burst

description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope has reached a major milestone by capturing its first direct image of TWA 7 b, a newly discovered Saturn-mass exoplanet orbiting the young star TWA 7. Using a coronagraph to block starlight, Webb identified the planet embedded in the star’s dusty ring system. TWA 7 b is the smallest exoplanet ever imaged directly. The discovery highlights Webb’s unprecedented precision and paves the way for imaging even smaller, potentially Earth-like planets with future observatories equipped with next-generation coronagraphs and infrared imaging instruments.
title: James Webb Telescope Captures First Direct Image of Saturn-Mass Exoplanet

description: NASA’s James Webb Telescope has identified ethanol and methanol isotopes around protostars and HD 100453. These discoveries offer valuable clues about the cosmic origins of life, indicating that comets filled with organic molecules might have seeded early Earth.
title: James Webb Telescope Detects Methanol and Ethanol Near Young Stars, Hinting at Life’s Origins

description: Apple is bringing support for its Swift programming language to Android, which could offer developers an alternative to Kotlin for app creation on Google's OS. With existing support for Swift on Windows and Linux, Apple has formed an Android Workgroup to ensure continued platform maintenance. This move could streamline cross-platform development for many.
title: Apple to Expand Swift Language Support to Android; Sets Up Android Working Group

description: A new report says stablecoins now account for most illicit activity on crypto ledgers. As per the new report from the Financial Action Task Force found that a wide array of illicit actors — including terrorists, drug traffickers and North Korean hackers — have stepped up their use of stablecoins since the group’s last report on digital assets in 2024.
title: Criminal Stablecoin Use Continues Growing, Task Force Says

description: FBC: Firebreak has surpassed one million players, Remedy Entertainment confirmed Thursd. The co-op shooter launched on June 17 and is available on Xbox Game Pass and PS Plus Game Catalog.
title: FBC: Firebreak Has Crossed One Million Players, Remedy Confirms

description: The Rubin Observatory has unveiled its first public images, revealing vivid views of the Lagoon and Trifid Nebulae located 4,000 light-years away. These stunning images mark the beginning of a decade-long sky survey that will capture thousands of nightly exposures, explore dark matter, and transform the way scientists—and the public—observe the dynamic universe.
title: Rubin Observatory Captures Distant Nebulae From Chilean Mountaintop

description: Honor Magic V5 will launch in China on July 2. Just days ahead of the formal reveal, Honor has announced that the foldable will come with a 64-megapixel periscope telephoto camera with support for optical image stabilisation (OIS). The foldable is teased to feature a Honor Luban shock-absorbing hinge.
title: Honor Magic V5's Periscope Telephoto Camera Teased Ahead of July 2 Launch

description: Twin satellites in ESA’s Proba-3 mission have successfully recreated artificial solar eclipses from space to examine the sun’s million-degree corona. The breakthrough will allow continuous observations of the sun’s outer atmosphere, offering rare insights that natural eclipses on Earth can’t provide. The mission marks a major step in solar science and is expected to capture over 1,000 eclipse hours.
title: Two Spacecraft Recreate Artificial Solar Eclipses to Observe the Sun’s Superhot Corona

description: Researchers from NTNU and EPFL have developed a compact, low-cost laser on a photonic chip using thin-film lithium niobate. This new laser enables ultrafast, mode-hop-free tuning and delivers stable performance with a single control knob. Demonstrated in LiDAR systems, it achieved 4 cm range precision for self-driving cars and also detected trace hydrogen cyanide for environmental monitoring. The breakthrough could transform precision applications like gas sensing and autonomous navigation, making advanced systems more affordable and accessible. The laser’s scalable chip-based design supports mass production using existing fabrication methods.
title: Breakthrough Laser Tech Enhances LiDAR Accuracy and Gas Detection

description: Canva introduced two new artificial intelligence (AI) features for its visual communications platform on Thursday. While these are backend features that will not be visible on the frontend to the user, they significantly improve its capabilities in terms of platform integration. The first new feature is Canva’s deep research connector for ChatGPT. This allows OpenAI’s chatbot to answer queries about the user’s Canva projects.
title: Canva Launches Deep Research Connector with ChatGPT, Introduces New Open MCP Server

description: Formerly introduced in the Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Ironheart follows the story of Riri Williams, whose invention of the armor is robust since Iron Man. This series will have mysterious events, magical clashes, and some crazy crossovers.
title: Ironheart Streaming Now: What You Need to Know About Latest Marvel Mini Series

description: Abhishek Bachchan’s Kaalidhar Laapata is now streaming on ZEE5. This Hindi remake of Karuppu Durai tells a heartfelt story of a man and a child fulfilling life’s last wishes. With themes of dignity, transformation, and human connection, it's a must-watch road drama.
title: Kaalidhar Laapata OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Abhishek Bachchan Starrer Online?

description: Maaman, starring Suri, Rajkiran, and Aishwarya Lakshmi, is all set to release on ZEE5 on June 27, 2025. The film, which had a theatrical release in May, follows the emotionally charged journey of a married couple navigating love, suspicion, and reconciliation.
title: Maaman Now Available for Streaming on Z5: Everything You Need to Know

description: Meta is reportedly planning to acquire the Palo Alto, California-based artificial intelligence (AI) startup PlayAI. As per the report, the acquisition is aimed at bolstering its AI division to compete with the likes of OpenAI and Google. The Menlo Park-based social media giant has been aggressively pushing out new AI models and AI features for its platforms.
title: Meta Reportedly Planning to Acquire Startup PlayAI and Some of Its Employees

description: Microsoft is replacing out its iconic Blue Screen of Death (BSOD) on Windows 11 later this year. The company recently confirmed its replacement will be a black screen, designed to offer more clarity when a crash occurs. Find out more about when the new black screen of death will make its way to Windows 11 users.
title: Microsoft to Replace Blue Screen of Death With Simpler Black Eror Screen Later This Year

description: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G has been launched in India. The phone is available in three colour options and is equipped with an Exynos 1380 SoC chipset under the hood. For optics, the handset has a triple rear camera unit with a 50-megapixel primary sensor. The Galaxy M36 5G packs a 5,000mAh battery and will go on sale in India via Amazon.
title: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G Launched in India With Exynos 1380 SoC, 5,000mAh Battery

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series is expected to launch in January next year, but rumours about the lineup are already doing the rounds on the Web. The South Korean company is tipped to pack 16GB of RAM in the Galaxy S26 series. This would be an upgrade over the Galaxy S25 series. Meanwhile, Apple’s iPhone 17 lineup is said to come with 12GB of RAM.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Said to Offer More RAM; iPhone 17 Lineup May Get 12GB RAM

description: Steam Summer Sale is now live, brinding deep discounts on games from all genres. Some of the best games of 2025 like Blue Prince, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 have received discounts during the sale.
title: Steam Summer Sale 2025 Best Deals: Assassin's Creed Shadows, Monster Hunter Wilds, Borderlands 3 and More

description: Vivo X200 FE has been confirmed to launch in India soon. While the exact launch date is still under wraps, Vivo has teased the key specifications of the phone. It will offer a Zeiss-branded triple rear camera unit, led by a 50-megapixel primary camera. The X200 FE will run on a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset and pack a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Vivo X200 FE Teased to Launch in India Soon; Key Specifications Revealed

description: YouTube is adding a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature to its platform. On Thursday, the video streaming giant announced Search Results Carousel, which will show up when users search certain keywords. The new carousel will feature suggested videos in a new layout as well as a text description of the videos to help users learn more about them before beginning to watch them.
title: YouTube Introduces AI-Powered Search Results Carousel, Shows a Snapshot of Suggested Videos

description: Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro was announced recently alongside a bunch of other products such as the Mix Flip 2, Redmi K80 Ultra, Xiaomi AI Glasses, and more. The new Pad 7S Pro offers big upgrades compared to the more recent Pad 7 Pro model but is not a big deal compared to the Pad 6S Pro. The highlight of the new Pad 7S Pro is indeed Xiaomi's recently announced Xring O1 processor, which will power the new tablet.
title: Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro With12.5-Inch Display and Xring O1 Processor Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Apple has changed rules and fees in its App Store in the EU after the bloc's antitrust regulators ordered it to remove commercial barriers to sending customers outside the store. Apple said developers will pay a 20 percent processing fee for purchases made via the App Store, though the fees could go as low as 13 percent for Apple's small-business program.
title: Apple Changes App Store Rules in EU to Comply with Antitrust Order

description: DeepSeek has reportedly not yet determined the timing of the release of its R2 model as CEO Liang Wenfeng is not satisfied with its performance. Over the past several months, DeepSeek's engineers have been working to refine R2 until Liang gives the green light for release, according to The Information.
title: DeepSeek R2 Launch Stalled as CEO Balks at Progress: Report

description: Google released a new open-source artificial intelligence (AI) model that can run locally on just 2GB of RAM. Dubbed Gemma 3n, it is built on the company’s new MatFormer architecture and uses Per-Layer Embeddings (PLE) to smartly manage storage space while remaining efficient. Notably, the model accepts multimodal input, but can only generate text output.
title: Google Releases Gemma 3n Open-Source AI Model That Can Run Locally on 2GB RAM

description: Redmi K Pad has been launched in China with an 8.8-inch display and a 7,500mAh battery. It is equipped with the MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset, paired with up to 16GB of RAM and a maximum 1TB of storage. The tablet runs on Android 15-based HyperOS 2 interface. The Redmi K Pad gets a 13-megapixel rear mounted camera, and an 8-megapixel camera on the front.
title: Redmi K Pad With 8.8-Inch 3K Display, 7,500mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Flipkart is using social videos and livestreams to convert young consumers spending a lot of time on their smartphones into loyal customers. While the concept of online retailers using videos to boost sales has been around for years, Flipkart hopes this strategy will give it an edge over rivals like Amazon.com and Reliance Industries in India.
title: Walmart-Backed Flipkart Turns to Videos and Livestream to Woo Indian Online Shoppers

description: Xiaomi Watch S4 41mm and Xiaomi Smart Band 10 were launched at the Human x Car x Home event on Thursday. The former arrives as a compact variant of the standard Watch S4, sporting a 1.32-inch circular AMOLED screen and up to eight days of battery life. Meanwhile, the Xiaomi Smart Band 10 is the successor to last year’s Smart Band 9 and comes with a 9-axis sensor and sleep monitoring features.
title: Xiaomi Watch S4 41mm With AMOLED Screen Launched Alongside Smart Band 10: Price, Specifications

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) has announced a flash sale in India. Teased via its social media handle, the sale is said to bring offers such as free data, broadband deals, and discounts. While the date remains under wraps, it is said to be "coming soon". Notably, it comes at a time when the state-owned telecom operator is losing subscriber momentum in India.
title: BSNL Teases Free Data, Broadband Deals and Discounts With Its Upcoming Flash Sale

description: At Capcom Spotlight livestream on Thursday, Capcom showed off both first and third-person gameplay for Resident Evil Requiem. The studio also explained why the game would not feature series icon Leon S Kennedy.
title: Capcom Showcases First and Third-Person Resident Evil Requiem Gameplay at Capcom Spotlight Livestream

description: Google's Call Screening feature for Pixel phones is reportedly heading to India, nearly seven years after its debut. This Google Pixel phone feature uses AI to offer smart reply suggestions during calls, but it could require manual user selection to respond in India. Apple is also expected to introduce similar call screening capabilities with its upcoming iOS 26 update.
title: Google Pixel Call Screening Feature Could Launch in India Soon With Support for Hindi: Report

description: Snapseed, Google's free photo editing app for iOS and Android, offers a user-friendly interface as well as advanced tools like Snapseed QR codes. These tools enable power users to effortlessly "share" their precise photo edits with others. Find out how to use Snapseed QR codes to streamline your edits, and share professional-grade adjustments with your friends using Snapseed.
title: Top 10 Snapseed QR Codes to Try in 2025

description: Xiaomi AI Glasses have launched in China, as a new wearable running on Xiaomi's Vela OS and powered by a Snapdragon AR1+ chip. They feature a 12-megapixel ultrawide camera, it supports first-person video and photography, similar to Meta Ray-Ban AI Glasses. Users can access live object recognition, real-time text translation, and voice assistance, on the Xiaomi AI Glasses.
title: Xiaomi AI Glasses With 12-Megapixel Camera, Snapdragon AR1+ Chip Launched: Price, Specifications

description: The Asus Chromebook CX14 has been launched in India. The laptop made its global debut in the markets nearly two months ago. It is powered by an Intel Celeron Processor N4500, which is paired with 8GB of RAM and eMMC onboard storage. The Asus laptop gets MIL-STD-810H US military standard certification and features a 180-degree “lay-flat” hinge design.
title: Asus Chromebook CX14 With Intel Celeron Processor N4500 Launched: Price in India, Specifications

description: Doppl, a new artificial intelligence (AI) app, was launched by Google on Thursday, June 26. The new app allows users to upload a full-length image of themselves and of the outfit they like, and see how it would look on them. This virtual try-on feature was originally planned as a new Shopping feature within AI Mode in Search.
title: Google Launches Doppl, a New App That Lets You Try-On Outfits Virtually

description: Nothing Phone 3 is scheduled to go official on July 1. While Nothing has been posting new teasers revealing the specifications of the upcoming phone, alleged renders of the phone have now surfaced online, showcasing the design. The leak shows the Glyph Matrix in the top corner of the rear panel. Renders suggest a new rear camera design.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Renders Leaked Ahead of July 1 Launch; Reveal Distinctive Rear Camera Layout

description: Xiaomi YU7 is now available for purchase in China, the company announced at its Human x Car x Home event on Thursday. The latest electric vehicle (EV) from the China-based company was launched in May and joined Xiaomi’s growing fleet of vehicles which already includes the Xiaomi SU7 sedan and its high-performance variant, the SU7 Ultra. The electric SUV is offered in three trim levels, from Standard to Max.
title: Xiaomi YU7 Electric SUV Officially Goes on Sale in China: Price, Features

description: Oppo K13x 5G will be available for purchase in India starting today (June 27), the company announced on Thursday. The phone was launched on June 23 and comes with a 360-degree Damage-Proof Armour Body and a MIL-STD 810-H certification for enhanced durability. It is powered by a Dimensity 6300 chipset and supports a suite of artificial intelligence (AI)-backed features.
title: Oppo K13x 5G With Dimensity 6300 SoC Sale in India Begins Today: Price, Availability

description: The Samsung Galaxy M36 5G is set to be launched in India today (June 27). The handset will arrive as the successor to the Galaxy M35 5G which was introduced in the mid-range segment last year. While a majority of the specifications remain under wraps, the South Korean tech conglomerate has been teasing its capabilities in days leading up to its launch. Here’s everything you know about the Samsung Galaxy M36 5G ahead of its launch in India today.
title: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G Launching Today: Expected Price and Specifications

description: The top OTT Platforms are ready with a new set of releases for this weekend to binge-watch. From Raid 2 to Squid Game season 3, there’s a lot to add to your watch list. Top streaming platforms include Netflix, Z5, Prime Video, JioHotstar, etc. Start streaming now.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (June 23 - June 29): Squid Game Season 3, Raid 2, Panchayat 4, and More
